reviews.review: Classic tac shooter, teamwork / communication / aim are all key. Beware of hackers. Consider using a 3rd party server such as esea or faceit.
If you're gonna get the game just make you get prime as well. Otherwise your lobbies will just be full of hackers and idiots.

Terrible matchmaking, Terrible ranking system, Terrible Anti-Cheat, Far too many non skilled weapons(Including the Awp), Valve couldn't give two shits about their game, Don't even bother opening up cases, Terrible muting system, Doesn't give a shit about throwers, and overall, shitty ass game. If you ever feel the need to want to rip your head out of your body, this is the right game for you. Am I still going to play this game and complain about how shitty it is? Yes I am. Thanks valve for ruining my life:)
